issue.title: [Python] Refine the fist draft of the PyArrow build setup changes
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16343](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16343). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*
